summary:
Scabies is a skin condition caused by tiny mites. It makes your skin very itchy and gives you a rash. You can get it from close contact with someone who has it, like during sex or living together. It's common in crowded places and areas with limited water access.

Doctors can help by prescribing special creams or pills. Everyone in your house should get treated at the same time, and you should wash your clothes and bedding in hot water. Scabies is very common, especially in children, and affects millions of people worldwide.
title: Scabies
